scriptLines: source1 derive(IDUnico = ERROR_FUNCTION('concat(__NEW_LINE_R____NEW_LINE_N__  formatDateTime(toTimestamp(Fecha), __SINGLE_QUOTE__yyyy__SINGLE_QUOTE__),__NEW_LINE_R____NEW_LINE_N__  formatDateTime(toTimestamp(Fecha), __SINGLE_QUOTE__MM__SINGLE_QUOTE__),__NEW_LINE_R____NEW_LINE_N__  formatDateTime(toTimestamp(Fecha), __SINGLE_QUOTE__dd__SINGLE_QUOTE__),__NEW_LINE_R____NEW_LINE_N__  formatDateTime(toTimestamp(Fecha), __SINGLE_QUOTE__HH__SINGLE_QUOTE__),__NEW_LINE_R____NEW_LINE_N__  formatDateTime(toTimestamp(Fecha), __SINGLE_QUOTE__mm__SINGLE_QUOTE__), // Minutos__NEW_LINE_R____NEW_LINE_N__  formatDateTime(toTimestamp(Fecha), __SINGLE_QUOTE__ss__SINGLE_QUOTE__)__NEW_LINE_R____NEW_LINE_N__)__NEW_LINE_R____NEW_LINE_N__')) ~> CrearIDUnico
